play.utils

类 Java

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.utils.Java

  • public class Java
extends java.lang.Object
    Java utils

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Java.FieldWrapper
      Field accessor set and get value for a property, using the getter/setter when it exists or direct access otherwise.
